properties.areaDesc: St Joseph to South Haven MI; Pentwater to Manistee MI; Grand Haven to Whitehall MI; South Haven to Holland MI; Holland to Grand Haven MI; Whitehall to Pentwater MI
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 6 at 3:31PM EST until January 8 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, southwest winds 10 to 20
knots with gusts up to 25 knots and waves 3 to 6 feet. For the
Gale Watch, northwest winds 15 to 25 knots with gusts up to 40
knots and waves 6 to 9 feet possible.

* WHERE...St Joseph to Manistee.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 1 PM EST Tuesday.
For the Gale Watch, from Tuesday afternoon through late
Tuesday night.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST TUESDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT
